obj.name: sword
obj.long: A large sword with a strange mottled pattern on its blade. On the grip is a depiction of what appears to a pair of dice.
obj.detail: A large sword with a strange mottled pattern on its blade. On the grip is a depiction of what appears to a pair of dice.

obj.name: chalice
obj.detail: A magnificent silver chalice with carvings of ancient battles around it.

obj.name: scabbard
obj.long: An ingeniously worked leather scabbard which would fit a large sword.
obj.detail: An ingeniously worked leather scabbard which would fit a large sword.

obj.name: shield
obj.long: A crude bronze shield embossed to depict forgotten victories.
obj.detail: A crude bronze shield embossed to depict forgotten victories.

obj.name: stake
obj.long: A piece of wood with one end sharpened and charred where it was fire hardened.
obj.detail: A piece of wood with one end sharpened and charred where it was fire hardened.

obj.name: book
obj.long: A fetid book of Vogon poetry with a health warning on the cover.
obj.detail:
Unfortunately, I am familiar with this particular Vogon dialect and can translate the poetry. It reads as follows:
Oh feddled gruntbuggly thy micturations are to me As plurdled gabbleblotchits on a lurgid bee. Groop I implore thee, my foonting turlingdromes. And hooptiously drangle me with crinkly bindlewurdles, Or I will rend the in the gobberwarts with my blurglecruncheon, see if I don't
- Prostenic Vogon Jeltz
Don't say that I didn't warn you.

obj.name: door
obj.long: With a valiant effort, the door slowly grinds open. The hinges are loose and the door has to be lifted as it is moved.
obj.short: The door is reluctant to move, but with some encouragement it is finally persuaded to close.
obj.detail: The door appears to rather rickety and the hinges are loose. You can see some old marks where it was dragged along the floor.

obj.name: window
obj.long: With a great heave, you manage to get the window partly open. While it is stuck and won't open any further, it looks like you might be able to squeeze through.
obj.short: With a little help, the window comes crashing to a close.
obj.detail: The window looks like it might move given suitable encouragement. It is one of the few places on the house where the paint hasn't pealed.

obj.name: sarcophagi
obj.long: With much effort, you manage to prop open the lid of the sarcophagi. Inside, instead of a body or an empty box, you can see some stair descending into the blackness. A foul stench escapes. You seem to hear a furtive scampering on the steps as if perhaps something was fleeing the light.
obj.short: As you descend the stairs, the lid comes crashing down behind you cutting off the light.

obj.name: lid
obj.long: With much effort, you manage to prop open the lid.
obj.short: The lid comes crashing down cutting off the smell.

obj.name: lamp
obj.long: A curiously wrought old lamp. The controls are a little peculiar, but you manage to figure them out.
obj.detail: The lamp consists of a wrought iron frame containing a standard battery. Along one side is a lever which appears to turn the lamp on and off. The handle is in the shape of some mythological beast. The other decorations are unrecognizable.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The water is pouring down from above nearly covering the entrance to the cave. Enough is splashing around that you could probably get a drink.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The pool is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: water
obj.detail: The stream is clear and inviting. You can see a few fish slowly swimming in a deep part.

obj.name: bread
obj.detail: The bread is old and dried, but no mold is visible. You could probably eat it with no ill effects.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a grassy meadow. You notice a stream to your south, a small cliff to the west and to the north as well as to the east is what appears to be a forest. You can hear the sound of a nearby waterfall.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a grassy meadow.

loc.long: You seem to be trying to penetrate some dense brush. To the west the face of the cliff and to the north the brush gets even denser. There seems to be a clearing to the south and southeast. There is forest to the east and north.
loc.short: You seem to be trying to penetrate some dense brush.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are near one end of a trail that runs off to the northeast. There is forest all around the trail, but it appears to thin out towards the southwest. Perhaps there is a meadow there.
loc.short: You are near one end of a trail that runs off to the northeast.

loc.long: You are at the base of a small cliff on the west edge of the meadow. Travel to the north would be difficult due to some dense brush at the west end of a large forest.
loc.short: You are at the base of a small cliff on the west edge of the meadow.

loc.long: From the northwest corner of a meadow you can see the southern fringes of a large forest just to the north.
loc.short: You are in the northwest corner of a meadow.

loc.long: You are in a meadow just to the south of a large forest.
loc.short: You are in a meadow just to the south of a large forest.

loc.long: You are at the northeast corner of a meadow. There appears to be a trail leading off to the northeast. To the north and west are large forests.
loc.short: You are at the northeast corner of a meadow.

loc.long: You appear to be in the western fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the east. It sounds like there might be a stream in the vicinity.
loc.short: You appear to be in the western fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are at the base of a small cliff on the west edge of the meadow. Travel to the west would be difficult due to the cliff. You can hear the sound of a nearby waterfall.
loc.short: You are at the base of a small cliff on the west edge of the meadow.

loc.long: You are at the west side of a meadow. There is a cliff to the west. It sounds like there might be a stream to the south.
loc.short: You are at the west side of a meadow.

loc.long: You are at the east side of a meadow. There is a large forest to the east. You can hear the sound of a nearby stream.
loc.short: You are at the east side of a meadow.

loc.long: You appear to be in the western fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the east. It sounds like there might be a stream in the vicinity.
loc.short: You appear to be in the western fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are at the edge of a meadow. To the south, you can see a waterfall coming from the top of the cliff. There is a sizable pool of water to the base of the falls. It looks like you could probably crawl behind the falls, though it is unclear what that would accomplish besides soaking you in cold water. Travel to the west would not be successful due to the presence of a cliff.
loc.short: You are at the edge of a meadow near a waterfall.

loc.long: You are on the north shore of a pool of water. There is a small waterfall entering the pool from the west. A stream exits the pool to the east. There are some rocks on this side that would be suitable to sit on and perhaps eat a lunch. All in all, this seems to be a rather pleasant spot.
loc.short: You are on the north shore of a pool of water.

loc.long: You are at the east end of a pool of water where it exits into a stream. You can see a waterfall emptying into the west end of the pool. There are some rocks in the water here and it looks like you could cross the stream on the rocks. There are some blackberry bushes to the east
loc.short: You are at the east end of a pool of water.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a tangle of blackberry bushes. Travel to the east would be impossible. It might be able to escape to the west or north with only a few scratches.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a tangle of blackberry bushes.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a tangle of blackberry bushes. Travel to the east or west would be impossible. It might be able to escape to the north with only a few scratches.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a tangle of blackberry bushes.

loc.long: You appear to be in the entrance of a cave. Unfortunately, due to the general lack of illumination, you cannot tell how far back the cave goes, but you may be able to travel some distance to the west. On the other hand, you might fall into a pit and die. To the east you can see water streaming over the mouth of the cave.
loc.short: You appear to be in the entrance of a cave.

loc.long: You are in a space behind the waterfall. It looks like you could go to the northeast or southeast without getting too soaked. There also appears to be a small cave to the west.
loc.short: You are in a space behind the waterfall.

loc.long: You have unwisely tried to use the waterfall as a shower. Unfortunately, it has a somewhat greater volume of water than the showers that you more customarily use. The impact seems to have killed you.
loc.short: You have unwisely tried to use the waterfall as a shower. Unfortunately, it has a somewhat greater volume of water than the showers that you more customarily use. The impact seems to have killed you.

loc.long: You are in a pool of water that is filled by a waterfall at the west end. A stream flows out of the east end.
loc.short: You are in a pool of water that is filled by a waterfall at the west end.

loc.long: You are standing in the middle of an east-west stream. There is a pool of water filled by a waterfall to the west. The stream continues to the east.
loc.short: You are standing in the middle of an east-west stream.

loc.long: You are in the middle of an east-west stream. There are a bunch of blackberry bushes on the south bank and a meadow on the north.
loc.short: You are in the middle of an east-west stream.

loc.long: You are in the middle of an east-west stream. There are a bunch of blackberry bushes on the south bank and a meadow on the north.
loc.short: You are in the middle of an east-west stream.

loc.long: To the north, you can see a waterfall coming from the top of the cliff. There is a sizable pool of water to the base of the falls. It looks like you could probably crawl behind the falls, though it is unclear what that would accomplish besides soaking you in cold water. Travel to the west would be difficult due to a cliff. There are some dense bushes to the south.
loc.short: You are south of the waterfall.

loc.long: You are on the south side of a pool at the base of a waterfall. To the north of the pool, you can see a meadow. Further to the south, there is some impenetrable underbrush.
loc.short: You are on the south side of a pool at the base of a waterfall.

loc.long: You are on the south bank of a stream. The a pool filled by a waterfall is to the northwest. To the south are some thorn bushes. The bushes to the east are blackberries and at least will have some good fruit when they are ripe.
loc.short: You are on the south bank of a stream.

loc.long: You have entered a clump of blackberries to the south of a stream. Unfortunately, none are ripe at this time. Perhaps if you try again later in the year you will have better luck. It looks like you can escape to the west.
loc.short: You have entered a clump of blackberries to the south of a stream.

loc.long: You have entered a clump of blackberries to the south of a stream. Unfortunately, none are ripe at this time. Perhaps if you try again later in the year you will have better luck. It looks like you can escape to the west.
loc.short: You have entered a clump of blackberries to the south of a stream.

loc.long: You have tangled yourself in some dense brush near the waterfall. The only route of escape seems to be to the north.
loc.short: You have tangled yourself in some dense brush near the waterfall.

loc.long: You are trying to penetrate some impenetrable underbrush. You can however go to the north.
loc.short: You are trying to penetrate some impenetrable underbrush.

loc.long: You are in a tangle of thorn bushes. Unfortunately, these will bear no edible fruit at any time during their life-cycle. It looks like it would be possible to exit to the north or northwest.
loc.short: You are in a tangle of thorn bushes.

loc.long: You are in the north fringes of a large forest. It looks like there is some clearing to the north.
loc.short: You are in the north fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the north fringes of a large forest. It looks like there is some clearing to the north.
loc.short: You are in the north fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be some clearing to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. You can see a clearing for a road to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. You can see a clearing for a road to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. You can see a clearing for a road to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. You can see a clearing for a road to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest. You can see a clearing for a road to the south.
loc.short: You appear to be in the southern fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be some clearing to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be a clearing for a road to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are on a road in a forest. The road appears to exit the forest to the east. The road also goes deeper into the forest to the southwest.
loc.short: You are on a road in a forest.

loc.long: You are on a road at the north edge a clearing. The road continues to the east. The road also enters the forest to the west.
loc.short: You are on a road at the north edge a clearing.

loc.long: You are on a east-west road at the north edge a clearing. To the south is what appears to be an abandoned house.
loc.short: You are on a east-west road at the north edge a clearing.

loc.long: You are on a east-west road at the north edge a clearing. The road also enters the forest to the east.
loc.short: You are on a east-west road at the north edge a clearing.

loc.long: You are on a road in a forest. To the east, the road ends abruptly in a washout. The road to the west appears to break out into a clearing.
loc.short: You are on a road in a forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be some clearing to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be a clearing for a road to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are at a bend in a road in a forest. The road appears to end a little ways to the south. The road also continues to the northeast.
loc.short: You are at a bend in a road in a forest.

loc.long: You are in a small north pointing finger of forest. There is a clearing to the east and road to the north and west. More forest is to the south.
loc.short: You are in a small north pointing finger of forest.

loc.long: You are at the west edge of a clearing to the northwest of an abandoned old house. There is forest to the west and a road to the north. The lawn is to the east.
loc.short: You are at the west edge of a clearing to the northwest of an abandoned old house.

loc.long: You are in the lawn in front of an abandoned old house. There is a road to the north. From here it doesn't look like entry would be easy or profitable. The windows are all boarded up. The front door is also boarded over. You could probably break it or one of the windows down if the porch would support your weight.
loc.short: You are in the lawn in front of an abandoned old house.

loc.long: You are in the clearing to the northeast of an abandoned old house. The dilapidated garage is to the southwest. It looks like you might be able to force entry, but it would probably collapse on you if you did. There is also a road to the north.
loc.short: You are in the clearing to the northeast of an abandoned old house.

loc.long: You are in the western fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the west and a road to the north.
loc.short: You are in the western fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. There appears to be some clearing to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are standing on a section of trail through a large forest. The has a bend here. It extends to the east and the southwest. There appears to be some clearing both to the east and to the southwest.
loc.short: You are standing on a section of trail through a large forest.

loc.long: You have reached the end of the road. There are some old tire tracks where some people have turned around, but the road is starting to be somewhat overgrown. The road extends to the north. You can also make out a trail leading off to the west.
loc.short: You have reached the end of the road.

loc.long: You are in a small north pointing finger of forest. There is a clearing to the east and a road to the west. More forest is to the north and south.
loc.short: You are in a small north pointing finger of forest.

loc.long: You are in the clearing to the west of an abandoned old house. There is forest further to the west. From this angle, you can see no way into the house. There is a small grove of trees to the south.
loc.short: You are in the clearing to the west of an abandoned old house.

loc.long: You are in the north fringes of a large forest. It looks like there is some clearing to the north.
loc.short: You are in the north fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the clearing to the east of an abandoned old house. There is forest further to the east. From this angle, you can see no way into the house. There is also more forest to the south.
loc.short: You are in the clearing to the east of an abandoned old house.

loc.long: You are in the western fringes of a large forest. There is a clearing to the east.
loc.short: You are in the western fringes of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. It looks like there might be a trail to the northeast.
loc.short: You are in a large forest. northeast.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. It looks like there might be a road to the north.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You have entered a small crypt. There is a stone sarcophagi in the middle of the room. On the wall of the crypt is a frieze depicting what would seem to be major events from your life. However, on closer inspection, many of the events depicted seem to be of little significance or accuracy. It does look like you may, with some effort, be able to open the sarcophagi.
loc.short: You have entered a small crypt.

loc.long: You are at the base of some stairs. A low passage extends to the west.
loc.short: You are at the base of some stairs.

loc.long: You are in a low passage that extends to the east and west.
loc.short: You are in a low east-west passage.

loc.long: You have reached a peculiar looking entrance/exit. There are massive pillars on each side with large stone arches between them. Carved on the pillars are what appear to be people lightly dozing. You can continue to the east or the west.
loc.short: You are at the gates of light slumber.

loc.long: You have reached a peculiar looking entrance/exit. There are massive pillars on each side with large stone arches between them. Carved on the pillars are what appear to be people lightly dozing. You can continue to the east or the west. To the south appears to be the entrance to a cave. You can see some flickering light in the cave.
loc.short: You are at the gates of light slumber.

loc.long: You are in a small grove of trees. There is a clearing to the east and north. To the south in a large forest. To the west, you can see the entrance of a small crypt. Your name and today's date is inscribed in the plaque by the entrance. You get the uneasy feeling that someone is trying to play with your mind.
loc.short: You are in a small grove of trees.

loc.long: You are standing behind an abandoned house. It looks like you might be able to force one of the windows open to enter the house. To the west is a small grove of trees.
loc.short: You are standing behind an abandoned house.

loc.long: You are at the northwest edge of a large forest. There is clearing both to the north and west.
loc.short: You are at the northwest edge of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a large forest. You can see the forest thin off to the northwest.
loc.short: You are in a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a small, dusty walk-in closet off the west end of the hall. The smell of toxic cleaners is especially strong here.
loc.short: You are in a small, dusty walk-in closet off the west end of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a living room. Either the former tenants have been long gone, or they have been very careful to avoid disturbing the dust and cobwebs.
loc.short: You are in a living room.

loc.long: You are in a garage. The construction of this part of the house is not quite up to the standard building codes. In a number of places, you can see light shining throughout the walls and the roof. There is a door to the south that might lead into the rest of the house.
loc.short: You are in a garage.

loc.long: You are at the west end of the hall. You can see a rickety staircase leading both up and down.
loc.short: You are at the west end of the hall.

loc.long: You are at the center of an east-west hall. To the north, you can enter the living room, and to the south, a back room.
loc.short: You are at the center of an east-west hall.

loc.long: You are at the east end of the hall. The garage is to the north, and the kitchen to the south.
loc.short: You are at the east end of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a closet off of the bedroom. The bedroom is to the east.
loc.short: You are in a closet off of the bedroom.

loc.long: You are in the bedroom. At least, it looks like a bedroom, though the conspicuous absence of a bed might tend to refute this conclusion. The exit is to the north. You can also see a closet at the west side of the room.
loc.short: You are in the bedroom.

loc.long: You are in a back room. The door is on the north. It also looks like you could exit the house through a window here.
loc.short: You are in a back room.

loc.long: You are in the kitchen. There are marks on the floor where some major appliances were removed after the cockroaches had developed an advanced civilization.
loc.short: You are in the kitchen.

loc.long: You are in a storage room in the attic. There is not much to see here.
loc.short: You are in a storage room in the attic.

loc.long: You are at the top of the stairs, in the attic. You can see a small room to the east.
loc.short: You are at the top of the stairs, in the attic.

loc.long: You are in a small room in the attic. The stairs are to the west. There are also doors to the north, east, and south.
loc.short: You are in a small room in the attic.

loc.long: You are in what appears to be a library. There are shelves along all of the walls, except for the space occupied by the window and the door.
loc.short: You are in a library.

loc.long: You are in a bedroom in the attic.
loc.short: You are in a bedroom in the attic.

loc.long: You are in large room with a curiously raised tile floor. The bulk of the room is occupied by several rows of chest high metal cabinets.
loc.short: You are in large room with a curiously raised tile floor.

loc.long: You are at the bottom of the stairs. You can see a root cellar to the east.
loc.short: You are at the bottom of the stairs.

loc.long: You are in a root cellar. It is slightly chilly in here. You can also smell the typical musty smell associated with root cellars. There is a workshop to the south. There also appears to be a small passage to the east.
loc.short: You are in a root cellar.

loc.long: You are in a long, low room. Along the north wall is a rack containing a number of dusty bottles. Along the south wall is a row of large barrels mounted on low stands. Each barrel has a spigot near the bottom. Everything is covered with dust and cobwebs.
loc.short: You are in a wine cellar.

loc.long: You are at the west end of a tunnel below the wine cellar.
loc.short: You are at the west end of a tunnel.

loc.long: You are in an east-west tunnel.
loc.short: You are in an east-west tunnel.

loc.long: You are in what appears to be an alchemical laboratory. In addition to some esoteric instruments of natural philosophy, there are a number of cabalistic inscriptions on the walls. There is also a chart depicting all the possible combinations of the four elements.
loc.short: You are in what appears to be an alchemical laboratory.

loc.long: You are in a curiously furnished room. Along the walls are several desks each with several strangely curved dark windows. Mounted higher on the walls are other larger dark windows. Mounted in the middle of the room is a large crystal map with a number of strange symbols marked on it. You can see doors to the north, west, and south.
loc.short: You are in a curiously furnished room.

loc.long: You are in a cluttered workshop. The floor is covered with shavings and sawdust. There are some old tools mounted on the workbench. You can exit to the north. There is also another room to the east
loc.short: You are in a cluttered workshop.

loc.long: You are in a crowded storage room. The air is heavy with the smell of paint, toxic cleaners, and other household hazardous products. You can find fresher air to the west.
loc.short: You are in a crowded storage room.

loc.long: You are in what appears to be a large file storage room. The office is to the east.
loc.short: You are in what appears to be a large file storage room.

loc.long: You are in an abandoned office. The exit is to the north. There also appears to be another room to the west.
loc.short: You are in an abandoned office.

loc.long: You are in a curious room. There is a raised circle in the center of the room, and a small pedestal mounted consol off to one side. It is unclear just what sort of mystic rites would be performed here. The door is to the north.
loc.short: You are in a curious room.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in the middle of a large forest. There are trees in all directions.
loc.short: You are in the middle of a large forest.

loc.long: You are in a clear bubble underneath the front of the ship. There are control here which appear to be for the operation of a nearby weapon turret. Unfortunately, the controls are not clearly labeled so that operation under high stress conditions would probably be difficult. You can exit to the south.
loc.short: You are in a clear bubble with controls for the weapon turret underneath the front of the ship.

loc.long: You are in a tight crawl-way which gives access to many of the sensors mounted on the hull of the ship. You can exit to the south.
loc.short: You are in a tight crawl-way.

loc.long: You are in the west end of an engineering lab. There are numerous electronic instruments scattered around on various tables here.
loc.short: You are in the west end of an engineering lab.

loc.long: You are in the center of an engineering lab. There is a door to the south. To the west, you can see several pieces of electronic test equipment. To the east, you can see some fabrication machinery. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in the center of an engineering lab.

loc.long: You are in the east end of an engineering lab. There is some equipment here for building new machinery.
loc.short: You are in the east end of an engineering lab.

loc.long: Oh dear. It seems that this escape pod has already been jettisoned. As your air rushes out into the vacuum of space, you can faintly hear a claxon starting. As you loose consciousness, you can dimly see airtight doors slamming shut to seal off this section of the hall.
loc.short: Oh dear. It seems that this escape pod has already been jettisoned. As your air rushes out into the vacuum of space, you can faintly hear a claxon starting. As you loose consciousness, you can dimly see airtight doors slamming shut to seal off this section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a small room. There seems to be a complete supply of emergency provisions for any number of possible accidents. Because of this and the presence of some rudimentary controls, I would deduce that this is indeed an escape pod. You can leave to the south.
loc.short: You are in a small room.

loc.long: You are in a comfortable office off of the bridge. Whoever used this office appears to have been somewhat of a neatness freak. Everything is meticulously tidy. There are also no superfluous decorations. You can return to the bridge to the southwest.
loc.short: You are in a comfortable office off of the bridge.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the southwest and to the east with a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the east and west. There is a door to the north and to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You at the east end of the hall. It extends to the west. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You at the east end of the hall.

loc.long: You are at the north side of the bridge. There is a door to the northeast and one to the east.
loc.short: You are at the north side of the bridge.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall. It extends to the northeast and south. There is a door to the east and to the west.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall.

loc.long: You are in the tactical control center for this ship. In the center of the room is a three dimensional situation display with this ship at the center. You can exit to the west.
loc.short: You are in the tactical control center for this ship.

loc.long: You are in the northwest corner of a large room. In this room are a large number of stasis containers. Unfortunately, the labels are illegible, so that is in unclear if the contents of the containers are merely perishable or very hazardous-the two types of goods customarily transported in this fashion.
loc.short: You are in the northwest corner of a large room.

loc.long: You are in the northeast corner of a large room. In this room are a large number of stasis containers. Unfortunately, the labels are illegible, so that is in unclear if the contents of the containers are merely perishable or very hazardous-the two types of goods customarily transported in this fashion. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in the northeast corner of a large room.

loc.long: You are in the northwest corner of the main cargo hold. It appears that most of the cargo has been removed, but scattered around the room are a few damaged containers.
loc.short: You are in the northwest corner of the main cargo hold.

loc.long: You are in the northeast corner of the main cargo hold. It appears that most of the cargo has been removed, but scattered around the room are a few damaged containers. You can see a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in the northeast corner of the main cargo hold.

loc.long: You are in the west end of the main electronic equipment bay. This end contains the master control computer which directs the other control computers.
loc.short: You are in the west end of the main electronic equipment bay.

loc.long: You are in the east end of the main electronic equipment bay. This end contains most of the subsystem control computers. To the west, you can see the master control computer. The door is to the north.
loc.short: You are in the east end of the main electronic equipment bay.

loc.long: You are in the north end of the engine room. To the east is access to the number 2 engine. There is also a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in the north end of the engine room.

loc.long: You are in the south end of the bridge. The is a door to the east and one to the southeast.
loc.short: You are in the south end of the bridge.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the north and to the southeast. There are doors to the east and west.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the north and to the southeast.

loc.long: You are in the communication control center. There is a door to the west.
loc.short: You are in the communication control center.

loc.long: You are in the southwest corner of a large room. In this room are a large number of stasis containers. Unfortunately, the labels are illegible, so that is in unclear if the contents of the containers are merely perishable or very hazardous-the two types of goods customarily transported in this fashion.
loc.short: You are in the southwest corner of a large room.

loc.long: You are in the southeast corner of a large room. In this room are a large number of stasis containers. Unfortunately, the labels are illegible, so that is in unclear if the contents of the containers are merely perishable or very hazardous-the two types of goods customarily transported in this fashion. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in the southeast corner of a large room.

loc.long: You are in the southwest corner of the main cargo hold. It appears that most of the cargo has been removed, but scattered around the room are a few damaged containers.
loc.short: You are in the southwest corner of the main cargo hold.

loc.long: You are in the southeast corner of the main cargo hold. It appears that most of the cargo has been removed, but scattered around the room are a few damaged containers. You can see a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in the southeast corner of the main cargo hold.

loc.long: You are in the main engineering control room. There is equipment for controlling most of the functions of the ship here.
loc.short: You are in the main engineering control room.

loc.long: You are in a small ready room across the hall from the transporter. Along the walls are such useful items as weapons and protective clothing.
loc.short: You are in a small ready room across the hall from the transporter.

loc.long: You are in the south end of the engine room. To the east is access to the number 1 engine. There is also a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in the south end of the engine room.

loc.long: You are in a large, luxuriously decorated office to the southeast of the bridge. Whoever occupied this office seemed to have a taste for the finer things in life. There is a door to the northwest.
loc.short: You are in a large, luxuriously decorated office.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the northwest and to the east. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the northwest and to the east.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There is a door to the south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west. There are doors to the north and south.
loc.short: You are in a section of the hall extending to the east and west.

loc.long: You are at the east end of the hall. It extends to the west. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are at the east end of the hall.

loc.long: You are in a small observation dome on top of the ship. You can exit to the north.
loc.short: You are in a small observation dome on top of the ship.

loc.long: You are in the living area of one of the ships staterooms. The room extends to the east. There is also a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in the living area of one of the ships staterooms.

loc.long: You are in the inner sanctum of the stateroom. You can exit to the west.
loc.short: You are in the inner sanctum of the stateroom.

loc.long: You are in what appears to have been a cafeteria for the crew of this ship. To the east, you can see the kitchen. There is a door to the north.
loc.short: You are in the cafeteri.

loc.long: You are in the kitchen. There are facilities for preparing all sorts of exotic foods. The dining are is to the west. You can also see a walk-in freezer to the east.
loc.short: You are in the kitchen.

loc.long: It is very cold in here. Around you, you can see one of the largest ice collections you have ever seen. Warmer weather is to the west.
loc.short: You are in the freezer.

loc.long: You are in the transporter room. There is a raised circle in the center of the room, and a small pedestal mounted consol off to one side. The door is to the north.
loc.short: You are in the transporter room. There is a raised circle in the center of the room, and a small pedestal mounted consol off to one side. The door is to the north.

loc.long: You are in the access area for engine number 2. The main engine room is to the west.
loc.short: You are in the access area for engine number 2. The main engine room is to the west.

loc.long: You are in the access area for engine number 1. The main engine room is to the west.
loc.short: You are in the access area for engine number 1. The main engine room is to the west.

adventure.msg: Sitting at your computer to try out some new software, you feel a strange lethargy come over you... You awake to find yourself laying in the middle of a grassy field (someone seems to appreciate tired cliches). You can see the sun just beginning to rise over some trees to the (presumably) east. The early morning quiet begins to be shattered by the songs of birds. As you get up to take stock of your situation, you notice a stream to your south and a small cliff to the west. To the north as well as to the east (as you've noticed) is what appears to be a forest. You can also hear the sound of a nearby waterfall.
I can't find a %s.
I can't find a %s %s.
I can't switch a %s.
Turning a %s %s.
Turning a %s %s %s.
Which %s do you mean? I found the following:
A %s %s
It's dark in here. You are liable to trip and hurt yourself.
You are unable to pick up the %s
You need to specify an object
You can't open the %s because it is locked.
The %s is %s.
The %s is already %s.
You can't %s a %s.
I don't understand how to %s.
>%s< is not recognized as a valid command
***ERROR: You are unable to move in that direction. There is a missing message for the room described by: %s
Congradulations on leaving the starting point.
While the door appears to be rather rickety, it is closed and blocks your passage.
You might be able to squeeze through the window when it is open. However it is not currently open and you merely squish your nose against the glass.
You spread your arms and start flapping them. As you come crashing back to the ground, you realize that you are not a bird and are unable to fly.
Everything is rather blurry until you, coughing and sputtering, stick you head back out of the water.
You merely get your fingernails dirty while trying to imitate a gopher.
This message verifies that a number (%d) and a string (%s) can be passed
I'm afraid that there is no way to go in that direction.
The way up the stairs is blocked by a heavy stone lid.
You can't drink %s.
You drunk the %s and now feel much less thirsty.
You can't eat %s.
You ate the %s and now feel much less hungry.
Unfortunately, you have not yet reached the chapter in your karma development workbook titled How to Walk Through Walls, and you simply bump your head on the cliff.
You can see the following objects:
You close your eyes and start to clear your mind. As nothing happens, you begin to remember that this is covered in the advanced karma development correspondence course.
You are carrying:
You can notice that the air is beginning to be a little stuffy.
This air seems to be getting a little thick in here. Perhaps you need to get some fresh air.
You are beginning to find it difficult to breathe. Your head is starting to pound. Perhaps you should get a breath of fresh air.
Oh dear. You seem to have died of asphyxiation. Perhaps the air recycling unit on the ship wasn't working properly.

This program is a combination text adventure game and symbolic math package. Currently, the only math objects supported are polynomials. Functions that can be performed on polynomials are: create, delete, add, multiply, subtract, list, integrate, and derive.
For the adventure game part, commands are: N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW, Up, Down, get, drop, look, inventory, turn (object) on, turn (object) off, open, close, quit, read, examine and help.
